scripts.install: browserify src/index.js -t [ babelify --optional runtime ] -g uglifyify | uglifyjs --screw-ie8 -m -c dead_code,sequences,conditionals,booleans,unused,if_return,join_vars,drop_debugger > public/bundle.js
scripts.start: watchify src/index.js -t [ babelify --optional runtime ] -d -v -o public/bundle.js & serve public/ -p 1618
